home.headline: Modern Angular Template
home.text: Enterprise-ready Angular 19 starter with Tailwind CSS, NgRx state management, authentication, and 25+ production-ready components. Built for scale.

ngrx.title: NgRx State Management
ngrx.description: Experience reactive state management with NgRx Store. Type something, save it to the store, and see it persist across page refreshes with localStorage integration.

features.title: Features
features.text: Here is a list with implemented features that you can use right away.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS 3.0
tailwind.description: This template fully implements Tailwind CSS 3.0. You can use there templates right away within you components.

routing.title: Routing
routing.description: We added routing within the application and even a 404 error page, if the URL is incorrect.

i18n.title: i18n
i18n.description: This template uses ngx-translate. You can add multiple translation files to set up the app in different languages.

directory.title: Folder structure
directory.description: We set up a scalable folder structure, which you can use.

ngrx.title: NgRX
ngrx.description: NgRx is preconfigured. You do not need to install anything and are able to create actions, reducers and effects for your features.

standalone.title: Standalone Components
standalone.description: Angular 19 with Standalone Components architecture. Modern, module-free approach with simplified dependency management.

http.title: HTTP Client & API
http.description: Complete HTTP service with RESTful API examples (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE). Ready-to-use service with TypeScript interfaces.

interceptors.title: HTTP Interceptors
interceptors.description: Functional interceptors for authentication (JWT), loading states, and global error handling with toast notifications.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Full authentication system with login/logout, route guards, localStorage persistence, and reactive auth state management.

forms.title: Reactive Forms
forms.description: Form validation with custom error messages, i18n support, and integration with UI components.

components.title: UI Components
components.description: Professional component library: Button, Modal, Toast notifications, Icon system, and Loading spinner with Tailwind CSS.

loading.title: Loading States
loading.description: Automatic loading indicators for all HTTP requests with counter pattern for concurrent requests.

lazyLoading.title: Lazy Loading
lazyLoading.description: Route-based code splitting with lazy-loaded feature modules. Admin section demonstrates on-demand loading for better performance.

table.title: Table Component
table.description: Full-featured data table with sorting, filtering, pagination, and row selection. OnPush optimized with TypeScript generics.

pipes.title: Custom Pipes
pipes.description: Reusable pipes for text truncation, number formatting, relative time display, and search highlighting.

directives.title: Custom Directives
directives.description: Utility directives for hover highlighting, tooltips, and click-outside detection. Enhance UX with minimal code.

retry.title: HTTP Retry Logic
retry.description: Automatic retry mechanism with exponential backoff for failed requests. Intelligent retry only for GET requests and network errors.

performance.title: Performance Optimized
performance.description: OnPush change detection, trackBy functions, lazy loading, and code splitting for optimal Angular performance.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Signal-based theme service with localStorage persistence, system preference detection, and Tailwind CSS dark mode classes.

virtualScroll.title: Virtual Scrolling
virtualScroll.description: CDK Virtual Scroll for efficient rendering of large lists (10,000+ items). Only visible items are rendered in DOM.

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop
dragDrop.description: Angular CDK Drag & Drop for sortable lists and Kanban boards. Smooth animations and touch support included.

skeleton.title: Skeleton Loaders
skeleton.description: Reusable skeleton components for cards, tables, and text. Improve perceived performance during data loading.

errorHandler.title: Global Error Handler
errorHandler.description: Centralized error handling with user-friendly messages, automatic toast notifications, and remote logging support.

logger.title: Logger Service
logger.description: Structured logging service with log levels (debug, info, warn, error). Ready for remote logging integration.

featureFlags.title: Feature Flags
featureFlags.description: Signal-based feature toggle system with localStorage persistence. Control feature rollout and A/B testing.

demo.title: Advanced Features Demo
demo.subtitle: Demonstrating Table Component, Custom Pipes, and Custom Directives

table.description: Full-featured table with sorting, filtering, pagination, and row selection
